content: Google's Gemini 3.1 and updated AI Studio together constitute the best free AI prototyping and vibe coding tool currently available in the market.

Prototyping with AI Studio has fundamentally altered the author's product development process at work, shifting from spec- and design-first approaches to prototype-first validation with stakeholders and users within hours.

A 5-step tutorial demonstrates how to prototype new features using AI Studio, including building a base template, collaborating with an AI design partner to add features, iterating with AI for refinement, collaborating with others, and converting the prototype into a real product.
